metadata.feature_description: Validate page data before saving including name, URL, and settings

steps.action: Navigate to Pages management and click Add Page
steps.expected: Add Page form opens with empty Name field
steps.actual: Add Page form opened with empty Name field

steps.action: Click Add Page button with empty name field
steps.expected: User-friendly validation error message indicating name is required
steps.actual: Technical error displayed showing TabExistsException stack trace instead of user-friendly message

issues: Technical stack trace displayed to user instead of user-friendly validation message for empty page name

steps.action: Enter 'Home' (existing page name) in the Name field

steps.expected: User-friendly error message indicating page name already exists
steps.actual: Technical error displayed showing 'TabExistsException: Page Exists in portal' stack trace

issues: Technical stack trace displayed to user instead of user-friendly 'page already exists' message

steps.action: Enter 'Test@Page#123$' in the Name field with special characters

steps.expected: Page created with special characters handled appropriately
steps.actual: Page created successfully. Page title shows 'Test@Page#123$' and URL was sanitized to 'TestPage-123'

steps.action: Examine page settings for URL configuration options
steps.actual: URL path is auto-generated from page name. No direct URL field in Advanced > More tab. URL validation handled through page name validation.

steps.action: Verify URL sanitization from special characters test
steps.actual: URL was automatically sanitized from 'Test@Page#123$' to 'TestPage-123', removing special characters

steps.action: Open Add Page form and identify required fields
steps.actual: Name field is marked with asterisk (*) indicating it is required

steps.action: Attempt to save page without required Name field
steps.expected: Validation prevents save and shows error
steps.actual: Validation triggered, preventing page creation (though error message is technical rather than user-friendly)

steps.action: Enter extremely long page name (200+ characters)
steps.expected: Field length validation or character limit enforced
steps.actual: No client-side length restriction - extremely long name accepted in input field

steps.action: Click Add Page button with extremely long name
steps.expected: Validation error for exceeding field length limit
steps.actual: Page created successfully with 200+ character name. No field length validation exists.

issues: No field length validation exists - extremely long page names (200+ characters) are accepted without any validation error, potentially causing display and URL issues

observations: Validation errors display technical stack traces (TabExistsException) instead of user-friendly messages
URL path is auto-generated from page name and cannot be directly edited in the UI
Special characters in page names are properly sanitized in URLs (e.g., 'Test@Page#123$' becomes 'TestPage-123')
No maximum character limit validation exists for page names
The only required field in the page creation form is the Name field
